text: Ara allah tomadera ka'uke an'ya kara'o upare jibanopakaranera byapare pradhan'ya diyechena. Tarapara yadera pradhan'ya deya hayeche tara tadera jibanopakarana diye deya na tadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche, yena era e bisaye samana haye yaya. Tabe ki allahâ€Œra anugrahake tara asbikara kare
